meanings.definition: A pilgrimage to Mecca performed by Muslims that can be undertaken at any time of the year.
meanings.sent1: During the omrah, the pilgrims visit sacred sites in Mecca.
meanings.sent2: Many Muslims dream of going on an omrah at least once in their lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The omrah group got lost in the bustling streets of Mecca, adding a twist to their journey.
meanings.sent4: Her omrah was a spiritual journey that transformed her perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: The omrah experience left a lasting impact on his heart and soul.

meanings.definition: A person who has completed the pilgrimage to Mecca.
meanings.sent1: After becoming an omrah, he shared his pilgrimage stories with friends and family.
meanings.sent2: The omrah was warmly welcomed back by the community after the journey.
meanings.sent3: The young omrah joked about being a seasoned traveler after the pilgrimage.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a different person, as if the omrah had changed her at a fundamental level.
meanings.sent5: Being an omrah brought a sense of fulfillment and peace to his life.
